sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'

import moment from 'moment'
import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap'

import {MdModeEdit} from 'react-icons/md'

const Memory = ({ memory }) => {
    return (
        <>


            <Card className='rounded py-3 my-3'>
                <Card.Img variant="top" src={memory.image}/>
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title>{memory.title}</Card.Title>
                    
                    <Card.Text>
                    {memory.content}
                    </Card.Text>
                    <Card.Title>Creator : {memory.creator}</Card.Title>
                    <Card.Subtitle>{moment(moment.createdAt).fromNow()}</Card.Subtitle>
                    <Button  style={{ width: '100%', background:'white', color:'#bd301c' }}>Go to memory</Button>
                </Card.Body>
                <Card.Footer className = 'bg-white pb-1'>
                    <LinkContainer  to='/' style={{cursor: 'pointer'}} >
                        <MdModeEdit color='blue'/>

                        

                    </LinkContainer>

                </Card.Footer>

            </Card>
            
                
            

        </>
    )
}

export default Memory
